title: Fun, Fast, and Easy
text: Redefine presentations with a click of a button. No more boring presentations. No more boring slides. No more boring Professors.

section.title: Engage Students
section.content: Unboringify aims to increase student engagement in the classroom. We want to make learning fun again.

section.title: Benefit Instructors
section.content: We want to make the lives of instructors easier. We want to make it easier for them to create engaging presentations.
